title: Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy - Bloody Omaha v1.3 Mod
description:
This mod originally seeded by by http://www.closecombatseries.net/

Name: Bloody Omaha
For: Close Combat 5 - Invasion Normandy
Version: 1.3
By: Dom

Description: From the shores of Omaha into the Bocage of Normandy. Dom writes, "This mod was an occasion for me to exercise my passion for history, gaming and drawing. But perhaps what I am most proud of, is that some of the best modders came together with me to help materialize my dream of simulating the landing of the V corps on these bloody beaches and to try to recreate these 5 days of fighting to secure the small beachhead between the towns of Isigny, Grandcamp, Port-en-Bessin and Trevieres. Why have I choosen Omaha for a CCV mod? I think that this area was perfect for an 1/1 operational scale. We designed this mod with a very high degree of historical accuracy but ofcourse we had to make compromises with the game engine. I choose this mod also because, by chance, I am a resident of Normandy, and I love so much this countryside, the sea and all these lovely little villages. This mod is also in memory of all these young men, Americans and Germans, who fought and fell on the ground of France."


Installation: 1. Full installation of Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy required. (Not included)
2. Install CC5_Patch_v5.01a.exe (Included)
3. Install Cfg13.zip (This is the Config Manager used to install mods - included)
4. Unzip bloodyomahamapsfull.zip to C:/Program Files/SSI/Close Combat Invasion Normandy/Maps or equivalent folder.
5. Unzip BloodyOmahaV13.zip to C:/Config Manager/Plugins or equivalent.
6. Run the Config Manager and install BloodyOmahaV13.
7. Play CC5


Notes: The following submods are optional... 
AlliesInlandSound - Install this plugin when you are inland during an American GC. 
USVetmod - Install this plugin when playing as American vs German AI to make the AI more difficult. 
GermvVetmod - Install this plugin when playing as German vs American AI to make the AI more difficult.

For additional info, patches, how to guides and updates for this mod and all others visit http://www.closecombatseries.net. To play online install the included GameSpy Arcade client (ArcadeInstallFull205-google.exe) and join the Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy Room.
